description: Uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro ari inshingano zaburi wese yaba umugore cyangwa umugabo.
title: Uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro ari inshingano zaburi wese yaba umugore cyangwa umugabo.
content: Uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro ari inshingano zaburi wese yaba umugore cyangwa umugabo. Bakwiye kumenya kandi ibyiza biri mu kuboneza urubyaro n’uburyo butandukanye bukoreshwa. Inama ku buryo bwo kuboneza urubyaro bashobora kuzisanga kwa muganga, mu babyaza, ku kigo nderabuzima cyangwa ku kigo cy’ubujyanama ku kuboneza urubyaro.
